resources.string: Internet is either unstable or not connected, please check your network.
Failed to locate. Please check the settings and try again later!
A same city already exists. You can not add it again.
Network error. Please check the network settings
Welcome to Time Weather! It is free to use however, it may incur data traffic fees. Please consult your service provider for any data traffic charges.
Have reached the maximum number of cities,please delete one city first
Your current location is %1$s. Do you want to add this location?
Time Weather strongly suggests the usage of locations in Settings to add a city.
Please open GPS to get current location.
Dear user, %1$s needs to be connected to the Internet when in use. Do you agree?
Dear user, %1$s needs to be connected to the Internet and access location when in use. Do you agree?
Dear user, %1$s needs to be connected to the Internet and automatically add your current location. Do you agree?
No detail forcast data for the next 24 hours
Set this page as home page
"Start version upgrade, would you like to continue? Please check Preferences Network connection. Please make network connected."
Please wait while querying new version
Please check the Preferences -> More settings -> Network connection, allows Lenovo Launcher to the network to obtain data？
Network error. Please get online and try again.
Using cloud to backup your homescreen will require a Lenovo account. This will consume data so it is recommended that you do so while connected through WLAN.
This will overwrite the previous backup.
Please open the traffic switch of the Lenovo desktop.
Lenovo desktop will not be able to use any network while the switch is off.
Restoring will need you to login to your Lenovo account. This process will consume some data and is recommended that you do this while connected through WLAN.
Cloud restore will restore your backup, and will restart your launcher after completion.
Cloud backup is in progress, please wait.
Cloud restore is in progress, please wait.
Querying Lenovo account information, please wait.
Cloud download ok, will you restore desktop now?
Cloud download ok, click to restore deskop now
Cloud download error, click to retry or cancel
Server abnormal, please try again later
Allow homescreen to use mobile network
Please retry under the interface of profile manager.
Desktop will not have mobile data traffic after closing
The following function allows the mobile network
Use mobile network recommendations and download new applications
Use mobile network download theme and wallpaper
The newly installed application automatically categorized into folders
Applications immediately organized to Category folder
Close option, newly installed applications will not be automatically organized into the corresponding folder
There is no enough space on the screen
The application is already in the folder
Welcome! In the game folder we can help you put together all of the games on the phone, while careful to recommend a fun game. Playing Come on!
Organize the game too much trouble?
Use the game folder, automatically organize your gaming applications, but also intelligent and recommend the latest hottest games.
Anytime to use the Games folder, you can find me in the desktop settings for more settings.
On your desktop currently no games folder, help you create one?
Games folder will continue to push new game, this feature can be turned off in the desktop settings.
%s install failed because there was not enough storage, please try again or remove it.
You install this game will consume a lot of traffic on mobile network environment. Recommended that you install in a WLAN environment.
You are currently not connected to WLAN To start the download immediately use mobile network traffic.
Will automatically download when connected to WLAN.
Network connection fails, it will automatically download the network connection.
Download failed, please try again later.
Game control is essential application for your daily recommended popular novelty fun game masterpiece.
You are not connected WLAN, Use mobile network download games? Fees charged by the operator.
Game Center has been frozen, can not launch
Using theme or wallpaper will consume your network traffic, WLAN connection recommended, would you like continue?
The current apk is not compatible with this machine. will you continue to start this application?
Using simplified animation (Suggested opened on low-end models)
Left sliding from the edge of the screen can change the wallpaper
From the left edge to the right sliding can change wallpaper.
Click on the icon, try the mass movement
Page, click on the icon, the shift to another screen
Cannot delete the folder for now

"You must use Wi-Fi to complete this download.
please start this download the next time you're connected to a Wi-Fi network."

"Starting this download now may shorten your battery life and/or result in excessive usage of your mobile data connection, which can lead to charges by your mobile operator depending on your data plan.
start this download the next time you're connected to a Wi-Fi network."
Do you want to retry downloading the file later or delete it from the queue?
"This file is queued for future download so isn't available yet."
"Can't finish download. There isn't enough space on external storage."
"Can't finish download. There isn't enough space on internal download storage."
"Download was interrupted and can't be resumed."
"Can't download. The destination file already exists."
"Can't download. The external media isn't available."
You can set up to 6 weather widgets
Disables editing if you has locked
Desktop layout has locked , you can unlock it by click Menu and then Homescreen Options-Switch-Lock desktop layout
You have locked the desktop layout. Unlock it by long-pressing the Menu button and going to \"Desktop Settings - Switch - Lock Desktop\"

Dear user, the data fees generated by internet use will be charged according to your standard plan. For charge details, please consult your local carrier. Agree to charges?
Please send us your suggestions through the network
Please send us your questions and suggestions and we will work to improve (200 characters or less please)
The data traffic switch is turned off, select Desktop Settings -> More Settings -> Data Traffic Switch
Network connection failed, please open a connection

Sent. Thank you for your support!
Failed to send, please try again...

Allows an app to add shortcuts without user intervention.
Allows the app to remove shortcuts without user intervention.
Allows the app to read the settings and shortcuts in Home.
Allows the app to change the settings and shortcuts in Home.

按确定将清空所有用户数据，将手机恢复出厂状态（包括内置SD卡），但保留已安装至手机中的应用，强烈建议普通用户不要使用，以免丢失手机中的东西

对不起，因为违反了用户协议您已被禁言.
友盟社会化组件（SDK）让移动应用快速整合社交分享功能，我们简化了社交平台的接入，为开发者提供坚实的基础服务。（一）支持各大主流社交平台， （二）支持图片、文字、gif动图、音频、视频；@好友，关注官方微博等功能。 （三）提供详尽的后台用户社交行为分析。www.umeng.com/social
